w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Buttons
w:HTMLPanel.p: A button is a Button widget which can be styled with properties like type or size.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Types and size
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use the type attribute to stylize a button.
Use the size attribute to change the size.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Button type="DEFAULT" text="Default" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" text="Primary" /> <w:Button type="INFO" text="Info" /> <w:Button type="WARNING" text="Warning" /> <w:Button type="DANGER" text="Danger" /> <w:Button type="LINK" text="Link" /> <w:Button type="ICON" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" text="Extra small" size="X_SMALL" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" text="Small" size="SMALL" /> <w:Button type="INFO" text="Default" size="DEFAULT" /> <w:Button type="WARNING" text="Large" size="LARGE" />

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: Set the iconType property to customize the button with an icon.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Default" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary" /> <w:Button type="INFO" iconType="VIEW" text="Info" /> <w:Button type="WARNING" iconType="VIEW" text="Warning" /> <w:Button type="DANGER" iconType="VIEW" text="Danger" /> <w:Button type="LINK" iconType="VIEW" text="Link" /> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="INFO" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="WARNING" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="DANGER" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="LINK" iconType="VIEW" />

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button states
w:HTMLPanel.p: Set the active property to true for the button appears pressed.
Set the disabled property to true to disable the button.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Default" /> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Active" active="true"/> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary Active" active="true"/> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Default" /> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Disabled}" disabled="true"/> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary Disabled" disabled="true"/>
